naslov: Okrug Donji, super luksuzna vila u prvom redu do mora, 349 m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Super luksuzna i moderna vila na tri etaže u Okrugu Donjem, u prvom redu do mora. Novogradnja, s 349 m2 stambenog prostora, vanjskim grijanim bazenom od 42 m2 i izuzetno uređenom okućnicom od 448 m². U suterenu se nalazi kao jedna cjelina vrlo prostrana kuhinja, blagovaonica i dnevni boravak od ukupno 84 m2, dvije spavaće sobe svaka s kupaonicom, još jedan dnevni boravak, hodnik, ostava i WC. Vani se prostire veliki bazen s posebnom rasvjetom i nenadmašnim pogledom na more. U prizemlju se nalaze još tri spavaće sobe sa svojim kupaonicama, garderoba, praonica rublja i hodnik. Tu je i pristup raskošnoj terasi s jacuzzijem. Poviše prizemlja je postavljena još jedna etaža s krovnom terasom, garažom za dva vozila te još jednim parkirnim mjestom. Vila je bogato opremljena s klima uređajima u svakoj sobi, dvije dizalice topline, luksuzno opremljenim kupaonicama, suvremenom stolarijom, stiliziranim pločicama velikog formata, bezokvirnim vratima za ležeran prolaz iz jedne u drugu prostoriju te modernim sustavom video nadzora i alarmnim sistemom. Cijelu vilu odlikuje prekrasan panoramski pogled na more u kojem se može u potpunosti uživati zahvaljujući aluminijskim prozorima koji se protežu od poda do stropa. Predivno zelenilo u posebno uređenom vrtu oko rezidencije upotpunjuje cijelu sliku, a u kombinaciji s modernom rasvjetom, učinit će svaku večer nezaboravnom. A na korak od vile nalaze se plaža i šetnica. Sama vila leži uz cestu sa svom infrastrukturom i dodatnim sadržajima u blizini. --- Super luxurious and modern villa on three floors in Okrug Donji, first row to the sea. New construction, with 349 m2 of living space, outdoor heated pool of 42 m2 and a well-kept garden of 448 m2. Partially subterranean floor features a very spacious kitchen, dining room and living room of 84 m2, two bedrooms each with a bathroom, another living room, hallway, pantry and toilet. Outside lies a large swimming pool with special lighting and unsurpassed sea view. Ground floor comprises three more bedrooms with their own bathrooms, dressing room, laundry and hallway. This floor also has access to the sumptuous jacuzzi-fitted terrace. The floor above entails roof terrace and a garage for two vehicles along with an additional parking space. The villa is richly equipped with air conditioning units in each room, two heat pumps, luxuriously equipped bathrooms, modern carpentry, stylized large format tiles, frameless doors for smooth passage from one room to another and modern video surveillance and alarm systems. The whole villa offers a beautiful panoramic view of the sea which can be fully enjoyed thanks to the spectacular aluminium, floor-to-ceiling windows. Beautiful greenery in meticulously landscaped garden around the residence completes the whole picture, and combined with modern lighting, will make every night unforgettable. And a step away from the villa lies the beach and a promenade. The villa itself lies along the road with all the infrastructure and additional facilities nearby.
